inventory=[{"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 56, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 15, "index": 33}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 30, "index": 43}]

thought: In order to craft black_terracotta, I first need to craft black_dye. The only way to do this is using an ink_sac, which is in slot 34. Therefore I will move the ink_sac to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
